## Julia Crossref Figure

```{julia}
#| label: fig-plots
#| fig-cap: "Plots"
#| fig-subcap:
#|   - "Plot 1"
#|   - "Plot 2"
#| layout-ncol: 2

using Plots
plot([1,23,2,4]) |> display

plot([8,65,23,90]) |> display
```

See @fig-plots for examples. In particular, @fig-plots-2.
